application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Birch (applicants ref. T1) - Fell to near ground level and treat stump to inhibit regrowth.Mixed Group of Hazel, Rhododendron, Pieris, Euonymus, Bamboo and Vviburnum (applicants ref. SG1) - Fell to near ground level and treat stump to inhibit regrowth.Mixed Group of Ivy and Privet (applicants ref. H1) - Remove Ivy from wall. Reduce height of all within 6.0m to 2.0m and cut back sides to reduce width to 0.5m. Trim thereafter on an annual cycle to maintain at broadly reduced dimensions.Mixed Group of Ivy, Privet, Yew and Bay (applicants ref. H2) - Reduce height of all within 6.0m to 2.0m and cut back sides to reduce width to 0.5m. Trim thereafter on an annual cycle to maintain at broadly reduced dimensions.1 x Service Tree (applicants ref. TG1) - Fell to near ground level and treat stump to inhibit regrowth.
